mapper.insert: INSERT INTO library_list(library_no, user_no, title, file_name, uuid_name, display_name, regdate) VALUES (1, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{fileName}, #{uuidName}, #{displayName}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM library_list WHERE library_list_no = #{libraryListNo} AND library_no = 1
mapper.select: SELECT library_list_no as libraryListNo, library_no as libraryNo, user_no as userNo, title, file_name as fileName, uuid_name as uuidName, display_name as displayName, regdate FROM library_list ORDER BY library_list_no desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dash_board(dash_board_no, project_list_no, user_no, memo) VALUES (null, #{projectListNo}, #{userNo}, #{memo})
INSERT INTO sprint(sprint_no, scrum_no, start_date, end_date) VALUES (null, #{scrumNo}, date_add(#{startDate}, interval +1 day), date_add(#{endDate}, interval +1 day))
mapper.update: UPDATE dash_board SET memo = #{memo} WHERE dash_board_no = #{dashBoardNo}
